phases.section: Safe Exit from Broken Dev Environment
actions: Commit all current changes to the dev exit branch.
Tag the commit with dev-broken-exit and the current timestamp.
Force push the branch and tags to remote for future recovery.
Switch to main: git checkout main
npm install (or cd mobile-native-fresh && npm install)
Confirm full app loads before resuming any feature work.
